text: nim'ma odeyanu janarannella suttuvaridiruvanu endu navu nimage helida sandarbha(vannu smarisiri). Navu nimage torisida a drsyagalannu mattu kurâ€Œanâ€Œnalli sapisalagiruva a maravannu navu janara palige parikseyagisiddeve. Navu avarannu eccarisuttiddeve. Adare adu avara bhari vidrohavannaste heccisuttide
